abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Geometry POLYGON((-80 40,-70 40,-70 46,-80 46,-80 40))", "HasCoordinate is true", "HasGeospatialIssue is false", "TaxonKey is Lysimachia ciliata L.", "Year 1970-2021" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Botany) Seed Plant Collection 1 records from University of South Carolina, A. C. Moore Herbarium 1 records from CHSC - CSU Chico, Chico State Herbarium - Vascular Plants 1 records from The vascular plants collection (P) at the Herbarium of the Muséum national d'Histoire Naturelle (MNHN - Paris) 1 records from Family Primulaceae in Digital Herbaria of CSBG SB RAS (NS) 1 records from Taxon occurrence data for the FungalRoot database 1 records from Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh Living Plant Collections (E) 1 records from Tropicos Specimen Data 2 records from Harvard University Herbaria: All Records 2 records from Botany Division, Yale Peabody Museum 2 records from University of Florida Herbarium (FLAS) 2 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 7 records from Geographically tagged INSDC sequences 8 records from Pl@ntNet observations 9 records from University of Vermont, Pringle Herbarium 11 records from Herbier du Québec (QUE) - Collection de plantes vasculaires 11 records from The New York Botanical Garden Herbarium (NY) 12 records from Canadian Museum of Nature Herbarium 22 records from Royal Ontario Museum Green Plant Herbarium (TRT) 23 records from Marie-Victorin Herbarium (MT) - Plantes vasculaires 57 records from CONN 67 records from Carnegie Museum of Natural History Herbarium 68 records from Pl@ntNet automatically identified occurrences 1259 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
